title: Level 3: EV Charging Load Balancing
description:
You're optimizing an electric vehicle charging station. Given the charging schedule below, what is the peak power demand (kW) at any single time slot?

Charging Schedule:
{{input}}

Format: VehicleID, StartTime(hour), EndTime(hour), ChargingRate(kW)
Find the maximum simultaneous power demand.
hint: For each hour, calculate the total power from all vehicles charging during that hour. The answer is the maximum total across all hours.
